content:
Sure! Here are twenty trivia questions and answers that could fit under the category "Marketing and branding":

1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The ultimate driving machine"?
* The German automaker BMW has used the slogan "The ultimate driving machine".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "Drive your way"?
* The Japanese automaker Toyota has used the slogan "Drive your way".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The power of dreams"?
* The Japanese automaker Honda has used the slogan "The power of dreams".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The best or nothing"?
* The German automaker Mercedes-Benz has used the slogan "The best or nothing".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "Engineered like no other car in the world"?
* The American automaker Cadillac has used the slogan "Engineered like no other car in the world".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "Don't be driven. Drive"?
* The American automaker Buick has used the slogan "Don't be driven. Drive".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "Find new roads"?
* The American automaker Chevrolet has used the slogan "Find new roads".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The brand of firsts"?
* The American automaker Oldsmobile has used the slogan "The brand of firsts".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The ultimate driving machine"?
* The German automaker BMW has used the slogan "The ultimate driving machine".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "Let's go places"?
* The Japanese automaker Toyota has used the slogan "Let's go places".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The world on wheels"?
* The German automaker Volkswagen has used the slogan "The world on wheels".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The shape of things to come"?
* The American automaker Buick has used the slogan "The shape of things to come".
1. Which automaker has used the slogan "The art of engineering"?
* The German automaker Audi has used the slogan "The art of engineering".

* The German automaker BMW has used the slogan "The ultimate driving machine".
